Warranty & Support

Product Warranty: For warranty information about this product, please click here

Price: $39.99
(as of Nov 30,2022 14:49:04 UTC – Details)

From the brand

Enjoy Music Wireless with Giveet

Giveet is specialized in manufacturing Bluetooth transmitter & receiver, PC headset and the products are RoHS, FCC and other international safety approved. With an experienced and professional team, we have exported our products to many countries and regions all over the world, especially US/UK. Our products enjoy a good reputation among our customers.

Bluetooth Transmitter for TV

Professional After-sales Team

12 months Hassle-free Warranty7*24H Professional Customer SupportContact us at anytime if you have any question

➤ EASY PAIRING & WIRELESS FREEDOM — Pair easily with any two Bluetooth devices at one time. Roam range up to 33 feet from paired Bluetooth devices. Meet all your needs of calling. Communicate all day worry-free with up to 15 hours of talk time.
➤ EXTENSIVE MATCH — This headset is not only a call, but also music, video and games. It is a versatile wireless office headset. This wireless headset compatible with most Bluetooth cell phone and laptop.Please make sure that your phone or computer support VOIP (Voice Over Internet Phone) function. Great idea for truck driver, call center, Skype, Mumble or other video chatting software, conference calls, webinar presentations, Macbook, Chromebook and more.
➤ SUPERIOR PERFORMANCE — ★ Superior 4X Noise Cancelling Microphone blocks out unwanted noise. The mic is also adjustable to pick up your voices loud and clear. ★ With the function of mute call, when you are not convenient for customers to hear your conversation, just flip the flip-boom to the original position, the customer will not hear your voice, without having to mute the phone. Note: The mute feature is only available for calls.
➤ ERGONOMIC DESIGN — The headset weights 1.7 oz, lighter than an egg and will not cause the feeling of overwhelming on your head, and offers you an ultra comfortable experience for extended periods of time wearing. Enjoy extended comfort with padded and flexible headband and 270 ° rotating microphones.
➤ STRONG GUARANTEE — All the Giveet Bluetooth headsets have Two Year Free Warranty and Lifetime Technical Support(Including battery). We offer 100% Money Back, free return or replacement service. If you have any problem (Such as Bluetooth connection, return, replace, etc), just feel free to contact us, we will give you a timely solution Within 24 hours.

[Upgraded in July 2021 ] BH-M9 Pro Bluetooth headset features soft padded ear cushion and an ultra-light custom fit design, provides 15 hours talking time after fully charged.

Recommended:

  • The M9 Pro Bluetooth headset is great for car driver or truck driver.
  • Works with ANY Bluetooth-enabled transmitter e.g. phone, computer, transmitter, Landline (Bluetooth) etc.
  • With mute function, you can block your voice during the chat.
  • Can use for extended periods – up to 15hr battery life. (Results may vary depending on volume settings and other conditions etc.)
  • Easily adjust audio volume from the BH-M9 Pro / connected device.
  • Ultra-comfortable fit with a very light 48g weight.

Doesn’t work / not recommended:

  • These are not Active Noise Cancelling headphones. Passive noise isolation ONLY. Cannot actively eliminate noise like Active Noise Cancelling headphones.
  • Bluetooth operation range may be affected by obstacles (concrete walls, doors, etc.) and other environmental factors.
  • For 3rd chat APP, such as Skype on cellphones or PC, the headset can’t control to answer/reject/hang up the coming calling.
  • For Win10 OS PC, the mute will be inactive.

Advanced Technology

  • Giveet Adopts latest Bluetooth V5.0 technology, means more stable transmission and faster speed. The Bluetooth headset can easily and quickly connect with smartphones, tablets and other Bluetooth devices within 33 feet.
  • Adopts advanced CVC6.0 noise canceling technology and upgraded chipset, filters nearly all background noise, allowing you to talk and listen with improved clarity.

Extra long working time

  • 180mAh battery offers up to 15 hours continuous talking time/ 13 hours music time (50% Volume)/ 200 hours standby time with a single charge of 2 hours.

Easy to Control

  • Redial the Dialed Number: Double press the MFB button for voice dialing when connected. Answer/ Hang Up/ Reject Phone: Short press the MFB button to answer and long press 1 second to reject when call coming. Short press the MFB button to hang up the call. Volume adjustment and song switching: Short press the Volume+/Volume- button to up volume/down volume; Long press for 1 second the Volume+/Volume- button to next song/previous song.

Specification:

  • Support: HSP, HFP, A2DP, AVRCP
  • Charging Voltage: DC 5V
  • Battery Capacity: 180mAh / 3.7V
  • Operation range: Class 2, 10 meters

Noise Cancelling Bluetooth Headset

Giveet BH-M9 Pro can pick up your voice exactly and block the noise from the surround, ensure the crystal-clear conversations even in noisy environment.

Driver Bluetooth Headset

Giveet BH-M9 Pro can support 15 hours continuous talking time and 200 hours standby time with single fully charged in just 2 hours. Very suitable for drivers.

Mute Function

When you want to block your voice during the chat, just rotate the boom mic upward to be parallel to the head band.

Notice: Mute function only works for calls on cell phone at present. We are improving this function so that it would be used on other third party apps and PCs in the future.

Read more

Upgraded with a Charging Dock

Giveet BH-M9 Pro Bluetooth headset is designed with a charging base, very convenient for charging and storage. You can also charge the headset with USB charging cable directly.

Connects 2 Devices at a Time

BH-M9 Pro cordless headset can pair with any Bluetooth-enabled devices, include iPhone, android phones, iPad, PC, and can connect with 2 devices at a time, you can switch between them freely as needed.

Activate Voice Assistance

Just press and hold the MFB button for 3 seconds to activate your voice assistance. Access Siri or Google Voice to make phone calls, listen to music, set reminders, and more. Always standby for you to improve high efficiency at work or control the conversation.

Read more
